PHRASE.LANG: You're such a crystal magnet! These Avalonian crystals will follow you where ever you may go.[#Legal]

Vous êtes un aimant de cristal! Ces cristaux avaloniennes vous suivra partout où vous pouvez aller.\n\nYou're such a crystal magnet! These Avalonian crystals will follow you where ever you may go.[#Legal]

Du bist so ein Kristall Magnet! Diese Avalonier Kristallen will dir folgen, wo immer Sie gehen können.\n\nYou're such a crystal magnet! These Avalonian crystals will follow you where ever you may go.[#Legal]
Sei proprio un magnete di cristallo! Questi cristalli Avalonian ti segue ovunque tu vada.\n\nYou're such a crystal magnet! These Avalonian crystals will follow you where ever you may go.[#Legal]
Eres un imán de cristal! Estos cristales Avaloniana te seguiré donde quiera que vayas.\n\nYou're such a crystal magnet! These Avalonian crystals will follow you where ever you may go.[#Legal]
You're such a crystal magnet! These Avalonian crystals will follow you where ever you may go.[#Legal]
